dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, big news in the travel world, right? We're hearing about Kazakh airlines suspending flights to the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it's not just us. A bunch of other major international airlines, like Air France-KLM, United, American Airlines, they've all canceled flights to places like Dubai and Doha too.

dialogue_turns.text: So, for our local carriers, um, Air Astana and SCAT, they've also decided to pull flights to Dubai and Doha.

dialogue_turns.text: Wow. And the Ministry of Transport is calling this a "forced and justified measure," which, you know, makes sense given the circumstances.
